titleStmt.title: The peoples right to read the Holy Scripture asserted in answer to the 6th, 7th, 8th, 9th, and 10th chapters, of the second part of the Popish representer.
titleStmt.author: Stratford, Nicholas, 1633-1707.

notesStmt.note: Appears as v. 5 of the 1848 ed.: A preservative against popery / edited by Edmund Gibson.
Attributed to Nicholas Stratford. cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
